name: InoReader by Lerkero: Beige and Black
description: Use of beige, brown, red, and black to make InoReader a more colorful experience. A basic CSS color edit. Notes included in the CSS to easily edit color changes to your liking.
additional_info:
Update 2014-Mar-10:
Inoreader has updated its interface and this CSS code does not work well with the new version. This beige and black theme only works with the "old" Inoreader theme from 2013.

Update 2013-Oct-22: 
Added additional customization options to match the new Inoreader light and dark themes. Some coding has changed such as the header bar with the navigation buttons. I tried my best to correct the changes to match the new Inoreader CSS, but I may have missed some things.

Notes are included in the CSS if you want to change any colors or settings.

Feel free to contact me if there are suggestions to change something. I'm not an expert at CSS, but I don't like how many websites don't have the option for a dark or colorful version that is more appealing than looking at a white and black slate.
